description: A Model Context Protocol server that provides access to BigQuery, enabling LLMs to inspect database schemas and execute queries.

connections.stdioFunction: config => ({command: "uvx", args: ["mcp-server-bigquery", "--project", config.gcpProjectId, "--location", config.gcpLocation, ...(config.dataset ? config.dataset.flatMap(d => ["--dataset", d]) : [])]})

dataset.description: Specific BigQuery datasets to consider; if not provided, all tables in the project will be considered.
